forTheProjectsWeSelect: For the projects we select to work with we provide full range of services which any STO require
fullPackageOfRequiredDocuments: Full package of required documents in addition to formulation of financial model, development of smart contract, in accordance with KYC/AML/accreditation
developmentOfTheSecurityToken: Development of the security token concept: Equity, Asset Reserve or Debt Token
developmentOfTokenOnThe: Development of Token on the Ethereum Blockchain according to the tokenization model developed (else your Own Blockchain is necessary)
developmentOfTheTechnicalPlatform:
Development of the technical platform for STO with KYC/AML and
Dividend Issuance
(White Label)
draftingAFullPackOf: Drafting a full pack of STO Legal Documentation: SAFT S, SAFT D, Terms & Conditions, Privacy Policy
formationAndIncorporationOfNecessary:
Formation and Incorporation of necessary entity structure for Security Token Issuer including SPV (Cayman, BVI, Estonia,
Swiss etc)
communityManagement247Community: Community management - 24/7 community support services in public Telegram group of the project
prWritingEditingAnd: PR - Writing, editing and publishing of your press releases in all major crypto related medias by our team of professional copywriters
chinaFundraisingMarketingPr: China - Fundraising, marketing, PR and roadshows
koreaIeoPossibilitiesCryptofunds: Korea - IEO possibilities, cryptofunds, marketing, PR and roadshows
